mapper.insert:
insert into u_history_temp (iccid ,money,update_date ,remark , imsi , packageType , packageDetail ) values
(#{item.iccid},#{item.money},#{item.updateDate} , #{item.remark}, #{item.imsi},#{item.packageType},#{item.packageDetail} )
insert into u_history_temp (iccid ,money,update_date ,remark , imsi , packageType , packageDetail ) values (#{iccid},#{money},#{updateDate} , #{remark}, #{imsi},#{packageType},#{packageDetail} )

insert into u_history ( iccid , money ,update_date ,remark , imsi , packageType , packageDetail) select distinct iccid , money ,update_date ,remark , imsi , packageType , packageDetail from u_history_temp
